text: This is the park locating on a hillside with the old Seoul City Walls. It has a great view of the old city walls behind and Dongdaemun Gate downward. This is also the entrance to Naksan Park and Ihwa Mural Village.Location:Close from metro 'Dongdaemun' exit #1 or #9. Locating across from Dongdaemun Gate. Walkable distance from DDP(Dongdaemun Design Plaza) as well.- Seonggwak in Korean means a fortress.- This amazing park is still yet to be famous and this is a good place to chill.- For seniors who have trouble to climb up the hill, there's an elevator in Seoul Design Center locating in the park. And the rear exit of this building is connected to the middle of the hill.
